item.title: New Anti-Hegseth Op Illustrates The Media’s Campaign To Protect The Pentagon Status Quo
item.description: If Hegseth's tenure as defense secretary thus far is what 'total chaos' is supposed to look like, then by all means keep it coming.

item.title: U.S. Congressman Backtracks On Social Media Post Claiming He Fired Weapons At Nuclear-Armed Russia
item.description: The post leaves little room for interpretation. It sure looks like a sitting U.S. congressman fired shots into Russia, ratcheting up tensions.

item.title: The Pete Hegseth ‘Chaos’ That Wasn’t Then And Isn’t Now
item.description: Two separate pieces attempting to lather up more Pete Hegseth controversy were published on Sunday, another coordinated campaign to take him down.

item.title: The Left’s Sudden Crusade For ‘Due Process’ Is A Political Smokescreen To Defend Mass Migration

item.title: Supreme Court To Decide On Parents’ Right To Exempt Children From Explicit LGBT Content
item.description: The Supreme Court will soon hear a decisive case for parents’ rights to opt their children out of explicit sexual content at school. Justices are set ...
